title: Dalamud Plugin Schema
description: A schema to validate Dalamud plugin data for the XIV Resource Registry project.

author.description: The repo author's name which should match their author metadata filename.

discord_url.description: The URL for the Discord server related to the Dalamud plugin.

internal_name.description: The internal name of the plugin.

name.description: The friendly name of the plugin.

obsolete_reason.description: The reason the plugin is considered obsolete.

plugin_type.description: The type of plugin (e.g., standard, umbra).

source_type.description: The type of source code repository.

source_url.description: The URL to the plugin's source code.

subfolder.description: The subfolder where the plugin is located; used for monorepos.
